title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.5 - Eligible costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.5 - Eligible costs

State Regulations

Grant funds awarded under this program may be used only for
the following: (a) salaries and
wages; (b) fringe
benefits; (c) contractual
services; (d) travel (at State
government rates); (e) advertising
and promotion; (f) supplies and
materials; (g) communication; (h) leased
equipment; and
(i) such other
expenses as the commissioner deems necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
391.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
